title: Ed25519 keypair generation and signing
description: Verify that the crypto module generates valid Ed25519 keypairs and can sign messages that are verifiable.

steps.expected: Returns object with publicKey (base64 string, 44 chars) and privateKey (base64 string)

steps.action: Sign a test payload "hello world" with the private key
Verify the signature against the payload using the public key
Generate a second keypair and try to verify the first signature with the second public key
Call storeKeyInKeychain() with the private key
steps.expected: Key stored successfully in macOS Keychain as credential-cc4me-agent-key
Returns the same private key that was stored
